en.av_c2: ...and as usual, the queue constructor allows an optional parameter to set the maximum size of the queue.
en.av_c3: The array as created is actually large enough to hold one element more than the queue will allow, so that empty queues can be distinguished from full queues.
en.av_c4: Member maxSize is used to control the circular motion of the queue (it is the base for the modulus operator).
en.av_c5: Member rear is set to the position of the current rear element, while front is the position of the current front element.
